Title: Xiao Cangshu Di Di de Chi Bo Richang
Description:
['Food broadcast newcomer, Little Hamster Flute, can rack its brains for ideas for his live broadcast. Although the food broadcast contents it has come up with is not very good, the videos are often clicked on due to some of the incredible live broadcast accidents and unexpected funny events. This makes the hamster very troubled.', '
